main event: A civilian observed a bright light in the sky over Denver, Colorado on July 6, 1969.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes and was described as elliptical in shape and changing color from white to blue-green., The object hovered at approximately 2,000 feet before rapidly accelerating in a northeasterly direction., The witness was a male, age 28, who appeared to be credible with no evidence of hoax or misidentification., Several other witnesses reported similar observations of the round, bright light., The Air Force concluded that the sighting had inadequate information for a positive identification.
sighted object: a single bright light, elliptical in shape
